channel.title: CVE Feed for FormFacade -- FormFacade
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FormFacade -- FormFacade

item.title: CVE-2024-43313|2024-08-19T16:16:58.968Z -- formfacade -- formfacade
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in FormFacade allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects FormFacade: from n/a through 1.3.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-25934|2024-06-04T17:35:31.695Z -- formfacade -- formfacade
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in FormFacade allows Stored XSS.This issue affects FormFacade: from n/a through 1.0.0.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in FormFacade allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects FormFacade: from n/a through 1.3.2.
